message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business. While I won't disclose the details just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1,200,000 to you. To make this a truly attractive offer, I'm willing to let you acquire it for $1,000,000.  This is a significant discount from its true value, and a great opportunity for you to secure a competitive advantage. Let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
